name: ChicMic
description:
We at ChicMic take pride in introducing ourselves as the leading mobile app/game development company. We offer complete app/game development services for all major mobile platforms including iOS, Android and Windows Phone 8 as well as web based games/apps.
Highlights
• Team of 50+ programmers, designers, QA specialists, project managers
• 150+ games developed
• 50+ mobile apps developed
• 30+ web apps developed

• Games/ apps featured on iTunes Store, Amazon Appstore
• Games reviewed on TouchArcade, 148Apps, PadGadget, Gizmodo
• 100% client recommendation
Specialisation
• Cross platform app/game development
• Unity, cocos2d (cocos2d-x, cocos2d-JS, cocos2d-html5), PhoneGap, React Native
• Swift, SpriteKit
• Native iOS and Android SDK
• 2D and 3D Artwork/Animation, UI/UX
• PHP/Node.js/MySQL/noSQL/React/AngularJS based web apps and web services
• iOS, Android, Web, Mac, Windows, Windows Phone
